Package Model.Cineplex

Class SeatRow

java.lang.Object
Model.Cineplex.SeatRow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SeatRow extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents a row of seats (including blocks) in the seating format of a cinema
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SeatRow(int rowNumber, int rowWidth, int[] aisleIndexes, SeatRowType rowType)
    Create a row of seats from a base of seat row types under the constraints of the size of the Cinema and the number of aisles

  • Constructor Details

    • SeatRow

      public SeatRow(int rowNumber, int rowWidth, int[] aisleIndexes, SeatRowType rowType)
      Create a row of seats from a base of seat row types under the constraints of the size of the Cinema and the number of aisles
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - The row number of the new seat row
      rowWidth - The width of the new seat row
      aisleIndexes - The block indexes to leave empty in the new seat row
      rowType - The type of seats included in this row

  • Method Details

    • intToRowLabel

      public static String intToRowLabel(int rowNumber)
      Converts the row number into the row label
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - The row number of the seat
      Returns:
      The row label of the seat

    • countSeatsByType

      public static Hashtable<String,Integer> countSeatsByType(SeatRow seatRow)
      Counts the number of each seat type in the seat row
      Parameters:
      seatRow - The row to count the number of each seat type
      Returns:
      A Hashtable of count for each seat type in the row

    • countTotalSeats

      public static int countTotalSeats(SeatRow seatRow)
      Counts the total number of seats in the seat row
      Parameters:
      seatRow - The row to count the number of each seat type
      Returns:
      total number of seats in the seating format

      public void removeBlock(int offset)
      Remove a seat from the seating format
      Parameters:
